03797   idx->m_bindto_type=TSV_BINDTO_CIDX;
03798   idx->m_bindto_clvl=clvl;
03799   idx->m_bindto_cidx=cidx;
03800   //
03801   assert(kind!=0);
03802   idx->m_kind=kind;
03803   idx->m_flags=flags;
03804   //
03805   return TSV_OK;
03806 }
03807 
03811 int
03812 affx::TsvFile::seekLine(linenum_t line)
03813 {
03814   //
03815   indexBuildMaybe();
03816   // off the end?
03817   if (line>m_index_linefpos.size()) {
03818     assert(0);
03819     return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
03820   }
03821   m_fileStream.clear();
03822   m_fileStream.seekg(m_index_linefpos[line]);
03823   // we seeked to this line, but did not read it.
03824   m_lineNum=line;
03825   //
03826   if (!m_fileStream.good()) {
03827     return (TSV_ERR_FILEIO);
03828   }
03829   return TSV_OK;
03830 }
03831 
03838 int
03839 affx::TsvFile::gotoLine(linenum_t line)
03840 {
03841   vector<linenum_t>::iterator lb;
03842   linenum_t sline;
03843 
03844   // do some bookkeeping first
03845   clearFields();
03846   indexBuildMaybe();
03847   //printf("gotoLine(%d)===\n",line);
03848 
03849   if (line>=m_index_linefpos.size()) {
03850     int maxLine = (int)m_index_linefpos.size();
03851     if (m_optAbortOnError) {
03852       TSV_ERR_ABORT("Cant goto line " + ToStr(line) + " of " + ToStr(maxLine));
03853     }
03854     return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
03855   }
03856 
03857   // Goto each parent lines first
03858   // This will bind the parent values so the view of the data is consistent
03859   for (unsigned int clvl=0;clvl<m_index_lineclvl.size();clvl++) {
03860     lb=lower_bound(m_index_lineclvl[clvl].begin(),m_index_lineclvl[clvl].end(),line);
03861     // Is this a parent line?
03862     if ((lb==m_index_lineclvl[clvl].end())||(*lb>line)) {
03863       sline=*(lb-1);
03864     } else {
03865       sline=*lb;
03866     }
03867     // move and parse
03868     //printf("%2d : seek(%d)\n",clvl,sline);
03869     seekLine(sline);
03870     nextLine();
03871     // done?
03872     if (sline==line) {
03873       break;
03874     }
03875   }
03876 
03877   return TSV_OK;
03878 }
03879 
03880 int affx::TsvFile::countTotalDataLines()
03881 {
03882   int line_cnt=0;
03883 
03884   // start at the beginning.
03885   rewind();
03886   // count them up.
03887   while (nextLine()==affx::TSV_OK) {
03888     // data line levels are >=0
03889     if (lineLevel()>=0) {
03890       line_cnt++;
03891     }
03892   }
03893   // back to the beginning so we leave the file at a known state.
03894   rewind();
03895 
03896   return line_cnt;
03897 }
03898   
03899 
03900 void affx::TsvFile::currentLineAsString(std::string& line)
03901 {
03902   for (int t=0;t<m_lineLvl;t++) {
03903     line.append("\t");
03904   }
03905   //
03906   for (int c_idx=0;c_idx<m_column_map[m_lineLvl].size();c_idx++) {
03907     if (c_idx!=0) {
03908       line.append("\t");
03909     }
03910     line.append(m_column_map[m_lineLvl][c_idx].m_buffer);
03911   }
03912   line.append("\n");
03913 }
03914 
03917 int
03918 affx::TsvFile::indexBuild()
03919 {
03920   std::fstream::pos_type excursion_fpos;
03921   TsvFileIndex* idx;
03922 
03923   //
03924   m_index_done=false;
03925 
03926   // force building the line index  // DEBUGGING
03927   //option_lineindex=true;
03928   // neednt bother building the indexes.
03929   //if ((option_lineindex==false)&&(m_index_vec.size()==0)) {
03930   //return TSV_OK;
03931   //}
03932 
03933   // clear out the line mappings
03934   m_index_linefpos.clear();
03935   m_index_lineclvl.resize(m_column_map.size());
03936   for (unsigned int clvl=0;clvl<m_index_lineclvl.size();clvl++) {
03937     m_index_lineclvl[clvl].clear();
03938   }
03939 
03940   // clear out the indexes.
03941   for (unsigned int i=0;i<m_index_vec.size();i++) {
03942     idx=m_index_vec[i];
03943     if (idx!=NULL) {
03944       idx->clear();
03945       // pre-compute the cidxes of the indexes which are by name
03946       if (idx->m_bindto_type==TSV_BINDTO_CNAME) {
03947         idx->m_bindto_cidx=cname2cidx(idx->m_bindto_clvl,idx->m_bindto_cname);
03948       }
03949     }
03950   }
03951 
03952   // remember where we are before we rewind
03953   excursion_fpos=m_fileStream.tellg();
03954   rewind();
03955 
03956   unsigned int m_index_vec_size=m_index_vec.size();
03957 
03958   int l_num;
03959   while (nextLine()==TSV_OK) {
03960     l_num=m_lineNum-1; // because nextLine went past it.
03961     // line->fpos
03962     m_index_linefpos.push_back(m_line_fpos);
03963     // if m_lineLvl is <0, then it was a comment or blank line
03964     // and there no need to do the rest
03965     //printf("L1: %4d : %4d : %u\n",l_num,m_lineLvl,(unsigned int)m_line_fpos);
03966     if (m_lineLvl<0) {
03967       // skip this line
03968       continue;
03969     }
03970     // parent-child lines
03971     m_index_lineclvl[m_lineLvl].push_back(l_num);
03972     //std::string key;
03973     //std::string val;
03974     //get(0,0,key);
03975     //get(0,1,val);
03976     //printf("L2: K:'%s' V:'%s'\n",key.c_str(),val.c_str());
03977 
03978     //
03979     for (unsigned int i=0;i<m_index_vec_size;i++) {
03980       TsvFileIndex* idx=m_index_vec[i];
03981       if ((idx!=NULL)&&
03982           (idx->m_bindto_clvl==m_lineLvl)&&
03983           (idx->m_bindto_cidx>=0)) {
03984         idx->data_add(&m_column_map[m_lineLvl][idx->m_bindto_cidx],l_num);
03985       }
03986     }
03987   }
03988 
03989   //
03990   m_fileStream.clear();
03991   m_fileStream.seekg(excursion_fpos);
03992 
03993   // mark the indexes as done
03994   m_index_done=true;
03995   for (unsigned int i=0;i<m_index_vec_size;i++) {
03996     TsvFileIndex* idx=m_index_vec[i];
03997     if (idx!=NULL) {
03998       idx->m_done=true;
03999     }
04000   }
04001 
04002   return TSV_OK;
04003 }
04004 
04007 int
04008 affx::TsvFile::indexBuildMaybe()
04009 {
04010   if (m_index_done) {
04011     return TSV_OK;
04012   }
04013   return indexBuild();
04014 }
04015 
04021 TsvFileIndex*
04022 affx::TsvFile::index_matching(int clvl,int cidx,int kind)
04023 {
04024   TsvFileIndex* idx;
04025 
04026   for (unsigned int i=0;i<m_index_vec.size();i++) {
04027     idx=m_index_vec[i];
04028     if ((idx!=NULL)&&
04029         (idx->m_bindto_clvl==clvl)&&
04030         (idx->m_bindto_cidx==cidx)&&
04031         (idx->m_kind==kind)) {
04032       return idx;
04033     }
04034   }
04035   return NULL;
04036 }

04091 int
04092 affx::TsvFile::findResultsClear()
04093 {
04094   m_findresults_pos=0;
04095   m_findresults.clear();

04106 template<typename T1,typename T2>
04107 int
04108 affx::TsvFile::findBegin_tmpl(int clvl,T1 cidx,int op,T2 val,int flags)
04109 {
04110   // discard the old
04111   findResultsClear();
04112 
04113   // gotta be there
04114   int cidx_int=cname2cidx(clvl,cidx);
04115   if ((clvl<0)||(cidx_int<0)) {
04116     return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
04117   }
04118 
04119   //
04120   indexBuildMaybe();
04121 
04122   // which index to use?
04123   TsvFileIndex* idx=index_matching_1(clvl,cidx_int,val);
04124   if (idx==NULL) {
04126     return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
04127   }
04128 
04129   //
04130   //if (idx->done==false) {
04131   //indexBuild();
04132   //}
04133 
04134   //
04135   idx->results_append(m_findresults,op,val);
04136 
04137   // should we sort by line position?
04138   if ((flags&TSV_ORDERBY_LINE)!=0) {
04139     sort(m_findresults.begin(),m_findresults.end());
04140   }
04141 
04142   // dont go to the first result -- findNext will do the movement.
04143   return TSV_OK;
04144 }
04145 
04147 #define TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(Xtype1,Xtype2) \
04148 int \
04149 affx::TsvFile::findBegin(int clvl,Xtype1 cidx,int op,Xtype2 val,int flags)  \
04150 { \
04151   return findBegin_tmpl(clvl,cidx,op,val,flags);    \
04152 }
04153 
04155 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(int        ,std::string);
04156 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(std::string,std::string);
04157 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(int        ,int);
04158 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(std::string,int);
04159 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(int        ,double);
04160 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(std::string,double);
04161 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(int        ,unsigned int);
04162 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(std::string,unsigned int);
04163 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(int        ,uint64_t);
04164 TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN(std::string,uint64_t);
04165 
04166 #undef TSV_DEFUN_FIND_BEGIN

04173 affx::TsvFile::findResultsCount()
04174 {
04175   return (int)m_findresults.size();
04176 }
04177 
04180 int
04181 affx::TsvFile::findNext()
04182 {
04183   if (m_findresults_pos>=m_findresults.size()) {
04184     return TSV_FIND_LAST;
04185   }
04186   return gotoLine(m_findresults[m_findresults_pos++]);
04187 }

04195 int
04196 affx::TsvFile::defineFile(const std::string& definition)
04197 {
04198   // clear out the old state
04199   clear();
04200   // and define the new...
04201   return defineFileParse(definition);
04202 }
04203 
04210 int
04211 affx::TsvFile::defineFileParse(const std::string& definition)
04212 {
04213   std::vector<std::string> split_line;
04214   std::vector<std::string> split_col;
04215   std::vector<std::string> split_coldef;
04216 
04217   splitstr(definition,'\n',split_line);
04218   for (unsigned int li=0;li<split_line.size();li++) {
04219     if (split_line[li]!="") {
04220       splitstr(split_line[li],'\t',split_col);
04221       for (unsigned int ci=0;ci<split_col.size();ci++) {
04222         // name,options
04223         splitstr(split_col[ci],',',split_coldef);
04224         //
04225         defineColumn(li,ci,split_coldef[0]);
04226       }
04227     }
04228   }
04229   return TSV_OK;
04230 }
04231 
04233 
04236 void
04237 affx::TsvFile::writeFieldSep(int cnt)
04238 {
04239   for (int i=0;i<cnt;i++) {
04240     m_fileStream << m_optFieldSep;
04241   }
04242 }
04243 
04247 int
04248 affx::TsvFile::write_str(const std::string& str)
04249 {
04250   if (m_optDoQuote==true) {
04251     m_fileStream<<m_optQuoteChar<<str<<m_optQuoteChar;
04252   } else {
04253     m_fileStream<<str;
04254   }
04255   return TSV_OK;
04256 }
04257 
04259 void
04260 affx::TsvFile::writeKeyValHeaders()
04261 {
04262   int h_size;
04263   int h_i;
04264   affx::TsvFile::header_t* h_ptr;
04265 
04266   // want to write them in order.
04267   resortHeaders();
04268 
04269   h_size=(int)m_headers_vec.size();
04270   for (h_i=0;h_i<h_size;h_i++) {
04271     h_ptr=m_headers_vec[h_i];
04272     if (h_ptr==NULL) {
04273       continue;
04274     }
04275     // Dont output bad headers which got stuck in with "addHeader_nocheck"
04277     // a comment?
04278     if (h_ptr->m_key=="") {
04279       m_fileStream << TSV_STRING_COMMENT << h_ptr->m_value << m_optEndl;
04280     }
04281     // key=value
04282     else if (headerKeyLegal(h_ptr->m_key)==TSV_OK) {
04283       m_fileStream << TSV_STRING_META << h_ptr->m_key << "=" << h_ptr->m_value << m_optEndl;
04284     }
04285   }
04286 }
04287 
04290 void
04291 affx::TsvFile::writeColumnHeaders_clvl(int clvl)
04292 {
04293   if ((0<=clvl)&&(clvl<m_column_map.size())) {
04294     size_t cidx_size=m_column_map[clvl].size();
04295     size_t cidx_size_1=cidx_size-1;
04296     for (size_t cidx=0;cidx<cidx_size;cidx++) {
04297       write_str(m_column_map[clvl][cidx].m_cname);
04298       if (cidx<cidx_size_1) {
04299         m_fileStream << m_optFieldSep;
04300       }
04301     }
04302   }
04303   m_fileStream << m_optEndl;
04304 }
04305 
04307 void
04308 affx::TsvFile::writeColumnHeaders()
04309 {
04310   for (unsigned int clvl=0;clvl<m_column_map.size();clvl++) {
04311     m_fileStream << "#%" << m_headName << clvl << "=";
04312     writeFieldSep(clvl);
04313     writeColumnHeaders_clvl(clvl);
04314   }
04315 }
04316 
04318 void
04319 affx::TsvFile::writeHeaders()
04320 {
04321   writeKeyValHeaders();
04322   writeColumnHeaders();
04323 }
04324 
04328 tsv_return_t
04329 affx::TsvFile::writeOpen(const std::string& filename)
04330 {
04331   // finish off the old stream
04332   close();
04333   // clear the error conditions before trying the open
04334   m_fileStream.clear();
04335   // start
04336   m_fileName=filename;
04337   m_fileStream.open(m_fileName.c_str(),std::ios::out|std::ios::binary);
04338   // throw if something really bad happens.
04339   m_fileStream.exceptions(ios_base::badbit|ios_base::failbit);
04340   //
04341   if ((!m_fileStream.is_open())||(!m_fileStream.good())) {
04342     if (m_optAbortOnError) {
04343       TSV_ERR_ABORT("writeOpen(): Couldn't open file '" + filename + "' to write.");
04344     }
04345     //    printf("open of '%s' failed!\n",filename.c_str());
04346     return (TSV_ERR_FILEIO);
04347   }
04348   return TSV_OK;
04349 }
04350 
04354 tsv_return_t
04355 affx::TsvFile::writeTsv_v1(const std::string& filename)
04356 {
04357   // this file format only supports one level.
04358   if (getLevelCount()>1) {
04359     return (TSV_ERR_FORMAT);
04360   }
04361 
04362   // set the personality
04363   m_optFieldSep='\t';
04364   m_optDoQuote=false;
04365   m_optQuoteChar='"';
04366 
04367   //
04368   tsv_return_t rv;
04369   if ((rv=writeOpen(filename))!=TSV_OK) {
04370     return rv;
04371   }
04372 
04373   writeKeyValHeaders();
04374   if (getLevelCount()==1) {
04375     writeColumnHeaders_clvl(0);
04376   }
04377 
04378   flush();
04379   return TSV_OK;
04380 }
04381 
04389 tsv_return_t
04390 affx::TsvFile::writeTsv_v2(const std::string& filename)
04391 {
04392   tsv_return_t rv;
04393   if ((rv=writeOpen(filename))!=TSV_OK) {
04394     return rv;
04395   }
04396 
04397   writeHeaders();
04398 
04399   flush();
04400   return TSV_OK;
04401 }
04402 
04403 
04407 tsv_return_t
04408 affx::TsvFile::writeTsv(const std::string& filename)
04409 {
04410   // use v2 ("#%headerN=") when required
04411   if (getLevelCount()>0) {
04412     return writeTsv_v2(filename);
04413   }
04414   // otherwise v1
04415   else {
04416     return writeTsv_v1(filename);
04417   }
04418 }
04419 
04423 tsv_return_t
04424 affx::TsvFile::writeCsv(const std::string& filename)
04425 {
04426   // this file format only supports one level.
04427   if (getLevelCount()!=1) {
04428     return (TSV_ERR_FORMAT);
04429   }
04430 
04431   // set the personality
04432   m_optFieldSep=',';
04433   m_optDoQuote=true;
04434   m_optQuoteChar='"';
04435 
04436   //
04437   tsv_return_t rv;
04438   if ((rv=writeOpen(filename))!=TSV_OK) {
04439     return rv;
04440   }
04441 
04442   //
04443   writeKeyValHeaders();
04444   writeColumnHeaders_clvl(0);
04445 
04446   //
04447   flush();
04448   return TSV_OK;
04449 }
04450 
04454 int
04455 affx::TsvFile::writeLevel(int clvl)
04456 {
04457   if ((clvl<0)||(clvl>=(int)m_column_map.size())) {
04458     // no levels to be written.
04459     assert(0);
04460     return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
04461   }
04462 
04463   // indent for the current level
04464   writeFieldSep(clvl);
04465 
04466   size_t cidx_size=(int)m_column_map[clvl].size();
04467   size_t cidx_size_1=cidx_size-1;
04468   int last_precision=-1;
04469 
04470   for (size_t cidx=0;cidx<cidx_size;cidx++) {
04471     TsvFileField* col=&m_column_map[clvl][cidx];
04472     //
04473     if (m_optDoQuote==true) {
04474       m_fileStream<<m_optQuoteChar;
04475     }
04476     // pick an output method based on the the current format of the value.
04477     // the ifs are ordered by frequency.
04478     if (col->m_val_state==affx::VALSTATE_STRING) {
04479       if ((m_optEscapeOk==true)&&(m_optEscapeChar!=0)) {
04480         m_fileStream << escapeString(col->m_buffer,m_optEscapeChar);
04481       }
04482       else {
04483         m_fileStream << col->m_buffer;
04484       }
04485     }
04486     else if (col->m_val_state==affx::VALSTATE_DOUBLE) {
04487       // change in precision?  Avoid doing this each time around.
04488       if (last_precision!=col->m_precision) {
04489         m_fileStream.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
04490         m_fileStream.precision(col->m_precision);
04491         last_precision=col->m_precision;
04492       }
04493       m_fileStream << col->m_value_double;
04494     }
04495     else if (col->m_val_state==affx::VALSTATE_INT) {
04496       m_fileStream << col->m_value_int;
04497     }
04498     else {
04499       TSV_ERR_ABORT("writeLevel(): internal error. m_val_state="+ToStr(col->m_val_state));
04500     }
04501     //
04502     if (m_optDoQuote==true) {
04503       m_fileStream<<m_optQuoteChar;
04504     }
04505     //
04506     if (cidx<cidx_size_1) {
04507       m_fileStream << m_optFieldSep;
04508     }
04509   }
04510   m_fileStream << m_optEndl;
04511 
04512   //
04513   if (!m_fileStream.good()) {
04514     TSV_ERR_ABORT("writeLevel(): bad filestream.");
04515     return (TSV_ERR_FILEIO);
04516   }
04517 
04518   return TSV_OK;
04519 }
04520 
04523 void
04524 affx::TsvFile::copyFormat(affx::TsvFile& f_tsv)
04525 {
04526   clear();
04527   //
04528   for (int clvl=0;clvl<f_tsv.getLevelCount();clvl++) {
04529     for (int cidx=0;cidx<f_tsv.getColumnCount(clvl);cidx++) {
04530       std::string cname;
04531       f_tsv.cidx2cname(clvl,cidx,cname);
04532       defineColumn(clvl,cidx,cname);
04533     }
04534   }
04535 }
04536 
04541 int
04542 affx::TsvFile::copyLevel(affx::TsvFile& f_tsv,int clvl)
04543 {
04544   if ((clvl<getLevelCount())&&(clvl<f_tsv.getLevelCount())) {
04545     for (int cidx=0;cidx<f_tsv.getColumnCount(clvl);cidx++) {
04546       set(clvl,cidx,f_tsv.m_column_map[clvl][cidx].m_buffer);
04547     }
04548     return TSV_OK;
04549   }
04550   return (TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND);
04551 }
04552 
04553 int
04554 affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(const std::string& fileName,
04555                                const std::string& colName,
04556                                std::vector<std::string>* vec,
04557                                int optEscapeOk)
04558 {
04559   affx::TsvFile tsv;
04560   int col_idx;
04561   std::string tmp_str;
04562 
04563   vec->clear();
04564 
04565   if (tsv.open(fileName)!=TSV_OK) {
04566     TSV_ERR_ABORT("extractColToVec: Cant open: '" +fileName+"'");
04567   }
04568   if (optEscapeOk==0) {
04569     tsv.m_optEscapeOk=false;
04570   }
04571 
04572   col_idx=tsv.cname2cidx(0,colName);
04573   if (col_idx<0) {
04574     TSV_ERR_ABORT("extractColToVec: column '"+colName+"' not found in file '"+fileName+"'");
04575   }
04576 
04577   while(tsv.nextLevel(0)==TSV_OK) {
04578     if (tsv.get(0,col_idx,tmp_str)!=TSV_OK) {
04579       TSV_ERR_ABORT("extractColToVec: Problem reading '"+colName+"' from '"+fileName+"'");
04580     }
04581     vec->push_back(tmp_str);
04582   }
04583   tsv.close();
04584   //
04585   return TSV_OK;
04586 }
04587 
04588 int
04589 affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(const std::string& fileName,
04590                                const std::string& colName,
04591                                std::vector<std::string>* vec)
04592 {
04593   int optEscapeOk=1;
04594 #ifdef WIN32
04595   optEscapeOk=0;
04596 #endif
04597   return extractColToVec(fileName,colName,vec,optEscapeOk);
04598 }

04605   m_optPrecision=p;
04606   return TSV_OK;
04607 }

04610 
04611 int
04612 affx::TsvFile::printDuplicateHeaders()
04613 {
04614   header_iter_t iter,iter_last;
04615   int dup_cnt=0;
04616 
04617   iter=m_headers_bykey.begin();
04618   // skip non key=val headers
04619   while ((iter!=m_headers_bykey.end())&&(iter->second->m_key=="")) {
04620     iter++;
04621   }
04622   if (iter==m_headers_bykey.end()) {
04623     return 0;
04624   }
04625   // walk the keys in order looking for dups
04626   while (1) {
04627     iter_last=iter;
04628     iter++;
04629     // done?
04630     if (iter==m_headers_bykey.end()) {
04631       break;
04632     }
04633     // a dup?
04634     if (iter->second->m_key==iter_last->second->m_key) {
04635       // print all the dup headers
04636       iter_last->second->print();
04637       dup_cnt++;
04638       while (iter->second->m_key==iter_last->second->m_key) {
04639         iter->second->print();
04640         dup_cnt++;
04641         iter++;
04642       }
04643     }
04644   }
04645   //
04646   return dup_cnt;
04647 }
04648 
04649 //
04650 affx::tsv_type_t TsvFile::stringToColType(const std::string& str)
04651 {
04652   if (str=="string") {
04653     return TSV_TYPE_STRING;
04654   }
04655   if (str=="int") {
04656     return TSV_TYPE_INT;
04657   }
04658   if (str=="float") {
04659     return TSV_TYPE_FLOAT;
04660   }
04661   if (str=="double") {
04662     return TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE;
04663   }
04664   // it is an error if we couldnt convert the string.
04665   return TSV_TYPE_ERR;
04666 }
